arts.sum: Augsburg players celebrate after Claude-Maurice's second goal, leaving Union Berlin with a mountain to climb - IMAGO/nordphoto GmbH / Engler Benedict Hollerbach of Union Berlin attempts to break past Chrislain Matsima of Augsburg, epitomising Union's efforts to get back into the match - IMAGO/Ulrik Pedersen

arts.ttl: 20:30 kick offs: Leipzig implosion, late madness in Bremen, Union Berlin and Hoffenheim beaten comfortably
arts.sum: On a hectic night across the Bundesliga, a resurgent Stuttgart overcame a Leipzig side imploding from the inside, Heidenheim rescued a point in a moment of madness at Weserstadion, whilst Bayern München and Augsburg comfortably saw off Hoffenheim and Union Berlin.

arts.ttl: Union Berlin weigh €5m bid for Portuguese attacker Nuno Santos
arts.sum: Germany's preeminent footballing publication reports that 1. FC Union Berlin are courting Portuguese attacker Nuno Miguel Valente Santos of Vitória de Guimarães.

arts.ttl: Union Berlin vs Augsburg preview: Union aim for first win under Baumgart
arts.sum: Union Berlin will aim to put some breathing room between themselves and the relegation zone as they host fellow strugglers Augsburg at the Stadion An der Alten Försterei in Wednesday's Bundesliga clash.

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg defender joins Augsburg on loan
arts.sum: FC Augsburg have loaned Cedric Zesiger from VfL Wolfsburg.

A meeting of two sides who both desperately needed the winter break to regroup, but Union enjoy 24 hours more rest and recuperation. FCA have secured 14 of their 16 league points at home, an indicati...

arts.ttl: Preview: Union Berlin vs. Augsburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Wednesday's Bundesliga clash between Union Berlin and Augsburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
